doc:
Martine Bartlett https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Martine_Bartlett 0 Martine Bartlett (April 24, 1925 – April 5, 2006) was an American actress. A life member of The Actors Studio, Bartlett is best-remembered, albeit not by name, for her chilling performance as Hattie Dorsett, the seriously disturbed, abusive mother of Sally Field's title character in Sybil. Martine_Bartlett ( April_24_,_1925 – April_5_,_2006 ) was an_American_actress . A_life_member of The_Actors_Studio , Bartlett is best-remembered , albeit not by name , for her_chilling_performance as Hattie_Dorsett , the_seriously_disturbed_,_abusive_mother of Sally_Field 's_title_character in Sybil .
